title: An answere vnto a wicked & infamous libel made by Christopher Vitel, one of the chiefe English elders of the pretended Family of Loue maintaining their doctrine, & carpingly answeringe to certaine pointes of a boke called the displaing of the Fam. Aunswered by I. Rogers.
author: Rogers, John, fl. 1560-1580.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Iohn Daye dwelling ouer Aldersgate,
